Articles.Content:
So, I've been searching for this forum on tapatalk and couldn't find it, which means it is definitely not tapatalk-able which would be very cool. I know vBulletin has a mobile version and it is nice to navigate it, but is still a bit clunky and tapatalk just does a better job.

Is there any possibility to get this forum registered on tapatalk? If I remember correctly it is 100% free.
I don't see it happening short term, but I'll definitely bring it up for the future

Tapatalk requires a server-side plugin, opens up security vulnerabilities by necessity, and shoves pretty little "Hey, dude, we totally have Tapatalk! Come on, use it!" banners in the face of the people who don't use it. It's a pile of bugs that isn't worth the trouble. vBulletin in itself is already a mess, no need to make that worse.
